title: Mongol Empire and increased cultural exchange

content.prompt: The establishment of the Mongol Empire directly facilitated which of the following?

choices.label: Increased cultural and technological exchange between the Islamic world and China
The development of Mongolian as the primary written language of administration across most of Eurasia
The spread of Persian culture into Central Asia
Improved ship designs and navigation techniques for oceanic commerce

topic.text: 2.2: The Mongol Empire and the Making of the Modern World
